      • subscribe

        public <T> com.canoo.dolphin.event.Subscription subscribe(Topic<T> topic,
                                                          MessageListener<? super T> handler)
        Description copied from interface: DolphinEventBus
        Register as a handler / listener for a given address. All messages that will be published for the given address by any dolphin session will trigger the given handler in the correct dolphin session.
        Specified by:
        subscribe in interface DolphinEventBus
        Parameters:
        topic - the topic
        handler - the handler
